org.ojai.store.cdc

Interface ChangeNode


  • @API.Public
public interface ChangeNode
    An encapsulation of a change to a single field in a Document.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ByteBuffer getBinary()
      Returns the value as a ByteBuffer.
      boolean getBoolean()
      Returns the value as a boolean.
      byte getByte()
      Returns the byte value of the current node.
      ODate getDate()
      Returns the value as a ODate object.
      int getDateAsInt()
      Returns a int representing the number of DAYS since Unix epoch.
      BigDecimal getDecimal()
      Returns the value as a BigDecimal.
      double getDouble()
      Returns the value as a double.
      float getFloat()
      Returns the value as a float.
      int getInt()
      Returns the value as an int.
      OInterval getInterval()
      Returns the value as an OInterval object.
      long getIntervalAsLong()
      Returns a long representing interval duration in milliseconds.
      List<Object> getList()
      Returns the value as a List<Object>.
      long getLong()
      Returns the value as a long.
      Map<String,Object> getMap()
      Returns the value as a Map<String, Object>.
      Object getObject()
      Returns the value as an Object of the underlying type.
      ChangeOp getOp()
      Returns the ChangeOp of the current change node.
      long getOpTimestamp()
      Returns the logical time of the data.
      long getServerTimestamp()
      Returns the server timestamp of this change operation as number of milliseconds since Unix epoch.
      short getShort()
      Returns the value as a short.
      String getString()
      Returns the value as a String.
      OTime getTime()
      Returns the value as a OTime object.
      int getTimeAsInt()
      Returns an int representing the number of milliseconds since midnight.
      OTimestamp getTimestamp()
      Returns the value as a OTimestamp object.
      long getTimestampAsLong()
      Returns a long value representing the number of milliseconds since epoch.
      Value.Type getType()
      Returns the type of the OJAI Value of the current node.
      Returns null if ChangeOp is not SET or MERGE.
      Value getValue()
      Returns The OJAI Value of the current node.

    • Method Detail

      • getOp

        ChangeOp getOp()
        Returns the ChangeOp of the current change node.

      • getType

        Value.Type getType()
        Returns the type of the OJAI Value of the current node.
        Returns null if ChangeOp is not SET or MERGE.

      • getOpTimestamp

        long getOpTimestamp()
        Returns the logical time of the data. The version is the same as the timestamp when this operation occurs. For a multi-version DocumentStore, the version is specified by the user.

      • getServerTimestamp

        long getServerTimestamp()
        Returns the server timestamp of this change operation as number of milliseconds since Unix epoch.

      • getByte

        byte getByte()
        Returns the byte value of the current node.
        Throws:
        TypeException - if this change node is not one of the numeric types

      • getShort

        short getShort()
        Returns the value as a short.
        Throws:
        TypeException - if this change node is not one of the numeric types

      • getInt

        int getInt()
        Returns the value as an int.
        Throws:
        TypeException - if this change node is not one of the numeric types

      • getLong

        long getLong()
        Returns the value as a long.
        Throws:
        TypeException - if this change node is not one of the numeric types

      • getFloat

        float getFloat()
        Returns the value as a float.
        Throws:
        TypeException - if this change node is not one of the numeric types

      • getDouble

        double getDouble()
        Returns the value as a double.
        Throws:
        TypeException - if this change node is not one of the numeric types

      • getDecimal

        BigDecimal getDecimal()
        Returns the value as a BigDecimal.
        Throws:
        TypeException - if this change node is not one of the numeric types

      • getBoolean

        boolean getBoolean()
        Returns the value as a boolean.
        Throws:
        TypeException - if this change node is not of BOOLEAN type

      • getString

        String getString()
        Returns the value as a String.
        Throws:
        TypeException - if this change node is not of STRING type

      • getTimestamp

        OTimestamp getTimestamp()
        Returns the value as a OTimestamp object.
        Throws:
        TypeException - if this change node is not of TIMESTAMP type

      • getTimestampAsLong

        long getTimestampAsLong()
        Returns a long value representing the number of milliseconds since epoch.
        Throws:
        TypeException - if this change node is not of TIMESTAMP type

      • getDate

        ODate getDate()
        Returns the value as a ODate object.
        Throws:
        TypeException - if this change node is not of DATE type

      • getDateAsInt

        int getDateAsInt()
        Returns a int representing the number of DAYS since Unix epoch.
        Throws:
        TypeException - if this change node is not of DATE type

      • getTime

        OTime getTime()
        Returns the value as a OTime object. Modifying the returned object does not alter the content of the Value.
        Throws:
        TypeException - if this change node is not of TIME type

      • getTimeAsInt

        int getTimeAsInt()
        Returns an int representing the number of milliseconds since midnight.
        Throws:
        TypeException - if this change node is not of TIME type

      • getInterval

        OInterval getInterval()
        Returns the value as an OInterval object. Modifying the returned object does not alter the content of the Value.
        Throws:
        TypeException - if this change node is not of INTERVAL type

      • getIntervalAsLong

        long getIntervalAsLong()
        Returns a long representing interval duration in milliseconds.
        Throws:
        TypeException - if this change node is not of INTERVAL type

      • getBinary

        ByteBuffer getBinary()
        Returns the value as a ByteBuffer. Modifying the returned object does not alter the content of the Value.
        Throws:
        TypeException - if this change node is not of BINARY type

      • getMap

        Map<String,Object> getMap()
        Returns the value as a Map<String, Object>. The returned Map could be mutable or immutable. Modifying the returned Map does not alter the content of the Value.
        Throws:
        TypeException - if this change node is not of MAP type

      • getList

        List<Object> getList()
        Returns the value as a List<Object>. The returned List could be mutable or immutable. Modifying the returned List does not alter the content of the Value.
        Throws:
        TypeException - if this change node is not of ARRAY type

      • getObject

        Object getObject()
        Returns the value as an Object of the underlying type. 
         Type.NULL      => null
 Type.BOOLEAN   => Boolean
 Type.STRING    => String
 Type.BYTE      => Byte
 Type.SHORT     => Short
 Type.INT       => Integer
 Type.LONG      => Long
 Type.FLOAT     => Float
 Type.DOUBLE    => Double
 Type.DECIMAL   => BigDecimal
 Type.DATE      => org.ojai.types.ODate
 Type.TIME      => org.ojai.types.OTime
 Type.TIMESTAMP => org.ojai.types.OTimestamp
 Type.INTERVAL  => org.ojai.types.OInterval
 Type.BINARY    => java.nio.ByteBuffer
 Type.MAP       => Map<String, Object>
 Type.ARRAY     => List<Object>

        Modifying the returned object does not alter the content of the Value.

      • getValue

        Value getValue()
        Returns The OJAI Value of the current node.
